subject: Basketball
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. All-Star Game will return to Madison Square Garden next weekend for the first time since 1998 and build on the history of the four previous games in the city.
snippet: The N.B.A. All-Star Game will return to Madison Square Garden next weekend for the first time since 1998 and build on the history of the four previous games in the city.
